snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins needed a boost to snap a three-game skid. They got it from Tanner Glass, who blocked shot after shot after shot by Nashville Predators captain Shea Weber....

headline.print_headline: Niskanen Has 2 Goals, Penguins Beat Predators 3-1
headline.main: Niskanen Has 2 Goals, Penguins Beat Predators 3-1

lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins needed a boost to snap a three-game skid. They got it from Tanner Glass, who blocked shot after shot after shot by Nashville Predators captain Shea Weber.
